hero_subtitle: The ultimate tool suite for Pok√©mon Unite
hero_desc: Competitive drafts, map timers, precise damage calculations, and tier list creation. Everything you need to improve.
draft_desc: Simulate realistic drafts with timers, bans, picks, and role filters. Perfect for training in competitive selection phases.
map_desc: Precisely track objective spawn timers (Regieleki, Rayquaza, etc.) to optimize your map control strategy.
calc_desc: Accurately calculate every move with items, levels, buffs/debuffs, and stacks. The essential tool for optimizing your builds.
tierlist_desc: Create and share your own custom tier lists. Rank Pok√©mon based on your criteria and compare with the community.

title: Pok√©mon Unite Draft Simulator
select_mode_text: Select a draft mode above to see its description.
tooltip_classic: Each team bans 3 Pok√©mon, then alternates picks until all slots are filled.
tooltip_swap: Teams swap the order of their 2nd and 3rd bans, then continue with normal picks.
tooltip_reban: After initial bans and picks, each team gets one additional ban before final picks.
tooltip_tournament: 2 bans per team then draft. Same as Rayquaza bans.
tooltip_maps: Choose a map or leave it random
tierlist_footer: Created by Fizzey ‚Äî Pok√©mon Unite Tierlist
map_timer_footer: Created by Fizzey ‚Äî Pok√©mon Unite Map Timer
soon_h1: Nothing to see, for the moment...
calc_warning_missing: Some items or passives may be missing and will be implemented later.
calc_warning_wilds: All wild Pok√©mon have their HP based on their first spawn in-game.
about_hero_desc: A project born from passion for Pok√©mon Unite and competitive esports. Built by a player, for players who want to improve seriously.
about_creator_body:
I'm Fizzey, a competitive Pok√©mon Unite player and passionate web developer. An active member of the French esport scene, I created Unite Tools to fill the gap in quality tools for our community.

My goal: make competitive resources accessible to everyone in the same place, for free, without compromising on quality.
about_quote: "My goal is to create a tool for the competitive community that I and my team will also use."
about_why_body:
The competitive Pok√©mon Unite scene was sorely lacking dedicated tools. No updated online draft simulator, no damage calculator, nothing to practice map control.

Unite Tools was born from that frustration. A solo project, built with passion, to raise the level of the entire community and beyond.
about_team_desc: Beyond building this site, I'm a player for Volticons Unite, a European team qualified in the official Pok√©mon Unite league.
about_tool_draft_short: Bans, picks, timer, Fearless mode & multiplayer
about_tool_calc_short: Precise calculations with items, levels & buffs
about_tool_tierlist_short: Create and share your custom tier lists
about_contact_body: Found a bug? Have a feature idea? We're available on social media.
